snippet: Cafe Mingala is New York City’s only dedicated Burmese restaurant.
abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Cafe Mingala, New York City's only Burmese restaurant, located on Upper East Side.
lead_paragraph: Cafe Mingala is New York City’s only dedicated Burmese restaurant.

headline.print_headline: You Say Myanmar, They Say Burma
headline.seo: Cafe Mingala Offers a Rare, and Constant, Taste of Myanmar
headline.main: You Say Myanmar, They Say Burma
